source.name: Bronx Remediation Sites as of 2007
source.description: The points in this file represent only the existence of a site which has cleanup currently, or has undergone cleanup under the oversight of DEC. This dataset includes a single point location for a subset of sites which are currently included in one of the Remedial Programs being overseen by the Division of Environmental Remediation.

datasets.name: Bronx Environmental Remediation Sites (pointmap)

This dataset includes a single point location for a subset of sites which are currently included in one of the Remedial Programs being overseen by the Division of Environmental Remediation.
